body_html: For those struggling with DataLoader, you may want to try using our simple implementation instead: https://github.com/fastai/fastai/blob/master/fastai/dataloader.py . It's a drop-in replacement that uses ThreadPool instead. That means, however, that your processing code needs to release the GIL, otherwise it'll be slow. (We use opencv for this purpose).

body: For those struggling with DataLoader, you may want to try using our simple implementation instead: https://github.com/fastai/fastai/blob/master/fastai/dataloader.py . It's a drop-in replacement that uses ThreadPool instead. That means, however, that your processing code needs to release the GIL, otherwise it'll be slow. (We use opencv for this purpose).
